name: Copycat (Anime)
text:
You can activate this card as a Spell Card.
If activated as a Spell Card: Target 1 Spell/Trap in your opponent's GY; activate its effect as this card's.
If this card is Summoned: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; this card's name, Level, Attribute, Type and ATK/DEF become that monster's original ATK/DEF, and replace this effect with that monster's original effects.
